p: This scoping review was determined based on the following frame works; identifying the research publications; sorting out the relevant studies; opting the studies for review; gathering the information; summarizing and reporting [ 6]. The review of published literature was deemed the most apt methodology for this project due to the lack of analytical reviews on HIV/AIDS in this international border area. We have tried to identify, organise the common themes and gaps regarding the transmission, molecular epidemiology, drug resistance (DR) and co-infection. This review was undertaken to examine the extent, range and nature of research activity; to determine whether a review is feasible and of value, to summarise research findings to policy makers, medical practitioners and identifying gaps in the existing evidence.
